learning_outcomes.description: Solve a variety of first order and second order Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs)
Derive properties of the hyperbolic functions and apply them in various mathematical contexts.
Understand and apply aspects of the theory of multi-dimensional integrals, using a variety of coordinate systems.
Apply differential calculus to the context of vector functions. Specifically, work with Grad, Div and Curl and understand their significance.
Apply integral calculus to the context of vector functions. Specifically, use surface and flux integrals, and the theorems of Green, Gauss and Stokes.
Understand and apply eigenvalues, eigenvectors and diagonalisation of matrices in a variety of contexts.
Apply concepts of orthogonality and inner product spaces to the method of least squares, best fit and function approximation
Model and solve problems with real-world application using mathematical techniques covered in this course.
Present clear and concise mathematical arguments in assignments and exams.

assessments.weighting: <dd>40% There will be four assignments in this sequence, each worth 10% </dd>
assessments.task_description: The assignment problems will cover material from the lectures, including the online-only lectures. It will be available from the course Blackboard page.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Assignments must be submitted online via Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: The end of semester examination in this course will be held during the end-of-semester examination period. It will be an in-person exam held on campus. The exam will be closed book.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to defer this exam.
